Q_DESC: Write a program to find a substring with in a string. If found display it's starting position, Else print "Substring not found".
TESTCASE_1:
hello
el
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Substring found at position 2
TESTCASE_2:
mango
go
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Substring found at position 4
TESTCASE_3:
srmuniv
sr
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Substring found at position 1
